DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to denote the treatment assignment code.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: Assignment; an undertaking that you have been assigned to do.

Concepts.definition: An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object._A system of numbered categories for representation of data._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An allotting or an appointment to a particular person or use, or for a particular time or object.: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4: Any single letter, number, or symbol.: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
